---
  title: Carrot Cake
  author: Marta
---

Ingredients:

-   carrots (medium size) - 2

-   oil - 1 cup

-   eggs - 3

-   flour - 255 g

-   baking powder - 1.5 tea spoon

-   baking soda - 0.5 tea spoon

-   brow sugar - 1.5 cup

-   cinnamon - 1 tea spoon

-   pecan nuts - 200 grams

-   salt - just a pinch for the magic ;)
